dmca.title: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
May 1st, 2008           

Sender Information:
Darshana Disley (Director)
Industria UK Ltd
Suite 78, 27 Colmore Row 
Birmingham
B3 2EW
UK 
Email: darshana@industriauk.com
Tel: (+44) 116 210 6823
Fax :( +44) 871 522 7359


Recipient Information: 
Christopher Schwarz (President) 
Conepuppy Cyber Wurx LLC
12430 Tesson Ferry Road
St. Louis
Mo 63128
USA
Tel:  (+1) 314-843-4698
Fax: (+1) 314-849-1052
Email: chris@cyberwurx.com

Sent via: Email & Fax

To Whom It May Concern: 
The following information is presented for the purposes of disabling websites/removing content (photographic images, screen grabs, trailers and videos) that infringes on our copyright as per the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. We appreciate your enforcement of copyright law and support of our rights in this matter.
Be aware that if you ignore this notice, you (as a Provider covered by the Digital Millennium Copyright Act) forfeit the Act's immunity from monetary damages, which range from $750 to $30,000 per work infringed and up to $150,000 per work for wilful infringement. Attorney's fees and costs can also be recovered.

What you (the Provider) need to do now:
1)	Reply to the Complainant (Us) that this notification has been received, within 24 hours. 
2)	Disable access to the infringing material or the customer's account. 
3)	Send the Complainant (Us) of the customer's counter notification and your (the Provider) intent to re-enable access to the material or the account of your (the Providers) assuming the counter notification meets the requirements of the DMCA Act.

Identification of Copyrighted Work  
The copyrighted images and videos appear on the following sites and its related pages.
HTTP://KILLERGRAM.COM
HTTP://ADOREANJALI.COM/
HTTP://WWW.ADOREAMATEURS.COM/
HTTP://WWW.UKPARTYSLUTS.COM/
Please also refer to the emailed attachments 
1.	INDUSTRIA UK LTD CONTENT AGREEMENT MAY 2005
2.	STAMFORD/NETPOND EMAIL DATED 9th May 2007
